ReferenceData.String:
FILE OPTIONS
-f <traj.xtc> (Input) Input file description -lib <libdata.dat> (Input, Optional, Library) Library file description -io <inout.dat> (Input/Output, Optional) Input/Output file description -o <> (Output, Optional) Output file description
OPTIONS
-[no]bool [<bool>] (yes) Boolean option -[no]hidden [<bool>] (yes) Hidden option -int <int> (2) Integer option -ivec <vector> (1 2 3) Integer vector option -double <double> (2.5) Double option -dvec <vector> (1.1 2.3 3.2) Double vector option -time <time> (10) Time option (ps) -string <string> (test) String option -enum <enum> (no) Enum option: no, opt1, or opt2
-sf <selection.dat> Provide selections from files -sel <selection(s)> Selection option
